title: [Installation]: add `latest` whl file in `view-source:https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly.html`
body_html:
In the pip file of nightly installation, it would be very convenient to add a latest wheel file, so it is easy to keep some script file (e.g. for CI) without changing.
i.e. https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly-latest-cp37-cp37m-linux_x86_64.whl
body_text:
In the pip file of nightly installation, it would be very convenient to add a latest wheel file, so it is easy to keep some script file (e.g. for CI) without changing.
i.e. https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly-latest-cp37-cp37m-linux_x86_64.whl
body:
In the [pip file of nightly installation](https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly.html), it would be very convenient to add a `latest` wheel file, so it is easy to keep some script file (e.g. for CI) without changing. 
i.e. `https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly-latest-cp37-cp37m-linux_x86_64.whl`
